parks.name: Busch Gardens
parks.description: Busch Gardens is one of America’s largest zoological institutions, with 335 acres (136 ha) and more than 2,700 animals.

rides.name: Air Grover
rides.description: Add to the excitement with this junior coaster set within the Sesame Street Safari of Fun area.

rides.name: Cheetah Hunt
rides.description: This triple launch roller coaster carries riders high above the park, then races down along the ground through a rocky gorge. At a length of 4,400 feet, Cheetah Hunt® is the park’s longest thrill ride attraction!

rides.name: Cobra's Curse
rides.description: Change your ride by changing who you ride with on this thrilling steel serpent. This one-of-a-kind roller coaster features a menacing 30,000-pound snake king and a 70-foot vertical lift that will take riders within inches of its 3 foot-wide eyes and 4-foot-long fangs.

rides.name: Congo River Rapids
rides.description: Climb aboard and enjoy a refreshing splash – or get seriously soaked. This expedition will send you twirling down a racing river through Congo, so get ready to get soaked!

rides.name: Falcon's Fury
rides.description: The height Falcon’s Fury® reaches offers an incredible view stretching well past downtown Tampa and encompassing all of Busch Gardens. The ride takes about a minute until riders get to its peak, giving plenty of time to enjoy the landscape.

rides.name: Iron Gwazi
rides.description: Iron Gwazi takes thrills to new heights, plunging riders from a 206 foot-tall peak into a 91-degree drop and reaching top speeds of 76 miles per hour.

rides.name: Kumba
rides.description: Touting one of the world's largest vertical loops, enthusiasts have consistently voted Kumba®, one of the world's best roller coasters! It is said that if you can hear the roar of a lion in the distance, you have crossed into his territory.

rides.name: Montu
rides.description: Climb high into the air and hold on for a twisting drop, a 60-foot vertical loop, an Immelmann loop and a weightless roll and that's only the beginning on this inverted roller coaster.

rides.name: Sand Serpent
rides.description: Families will love the curves, drops, and corkscrews of this "wild-mouse" style roller coaster located in the Pantopia® area of the park. SandSerpent is a fun-filled family coaster that zips, zooms and climbs five stories into the air before bringing riders back down in a roar of laughter.

rides.name: Scorpion
rides.description: The Scorpion® is one of only three roller coasters of its kind remaining in the world today, yet its sting is every bit as effective at instilling thrills through every twist and turn. Scorpion pulls you through a 360 degree loop and speeds of 50 miles per hour!

rides.name: Serengeti Express
rides.description: A ride on the Serengeti Express Train is one of the best ways to take in the breathtaking beauty and scale of Busch Garden's Serengeti Plain®.

rides.name: SheiKra
rides.description: Climb 200 feet to the edge of a 90-degree drop that inches you mercilessly over the edge—and stops. Then surrender to speed as you dive straight down into a 70 mph roller coaster.

rides.name: Skyride
rides.description: Take in beautiful views of roller coasters and the animals in our care as you cross our lush park from the comfort of your Skyride cable car, that runs between Egypt and Congo on the opposite side of the park.

rides.name: Stanley Falls Flume
rides.description: Catch a current of fun aboard the Stanley Falls Flume®, Busch Gardens Tampa Bay’s family-friendly log flume ride that’s perfect for younger guests. The ride twists and turns through a lush jungle before diving toward a final 40-foot splashdown. If you’re looking for a great way to cool off on a hot day, this is the ride for you!

rides.name: Tigris
rides.description: Catapult through an exhilarating array of looping twists with forward and backward motion and breath-taking drops

rides.name: Wild Surge
rides.description: Launch out of a 35-foot mountain crater up above a towering waterfall for a thrilling view of Jungala’s® village below. Look out for the gibbons and flying foxes as they soar pass the adjacent animal habitats!

parks.name: Disney's Animal Kingdom
parks.description: Disney’s Animal Kingdom distinguishes itself from the rest of Walt Disney World’s theme parks by featuring traditional attractions as well as hundreds of species of live animals.

rides.name: Avatar Flight of Passage
rides.description: Climb atop a winged mountain banshee for a breathtaking 3D flight over Pandora’s otherworldly landscape.

rides.name: DINOSAUR
rides.description: Travel back in time on a perilous prehistoric race to rescue a dinosaur—before the meteor strikes.

rides.name: Expedition Everest
rides.description: Careen through icy Himalayan peaks on a speeding train while avoiding the clutches of the mythic Yeti.

rides.name: Kali River Rapids
rides.description: Set out on a thrilling whitewater adventure through a lush jungle in the heart of Asia.

rides.name: Kilimanjaro Safaris
rides.description: Set off in an open-air vehicle for a guided tour of an African savanna—and spot live animals roaming free.

rides.name: Na’vi River Journey
rides.description: Take a mystical journey by boat deep into Pandora’s glowing bioluminescent rainforest.

rides.name: TriceraTop Spin
rides.description: Fly high on a dinosaur around a twirling tin-toy top at this delightful carnival-inspired attraction.

rides.name: Wildlife Express Train
rides.description: Cross the African savanna on a rustic locomotive for a behind-the-scenes look at the park’s animals.

parks.name: Disney's EPCOT
parks.description: Epcot is dedicated to the celebration of human achievement, namely technological innovation and international culture.

rides.name: Frozen Ever After
rides.description: Voyage to Arendelle aboard an ancient Nordic vessel as you take a musical tour of the wintery world of Frozen.

rides.name: Gran Fiesta Tour Starring The Three Caballeros
rides.description: Take in the sights of Mexico and the antics of 3 feathered amigos on this gentle boat ride through the Mexico Pavilion.

rides.name: Guardians of the Galaxy: Cosmic Rewind
rides.description: Take off on an intergalactic chase through space and time with the Guardians of the Galaxy.

rides.name: Journey Into Imagination With Figment
rides.description: Figment the playful dragon is your guide on this delightful ride through the sensory labs of Imagination Institute.

rides.name: Living With The Land
rides.description: Cruise past greenhouses on a gentle boat tour and discover the surprising history of farming.

rides.name: Mission: SPACE
rides.description: Blast off on a thrilling simulated NASA-style mission to Mars—or orbit the Earth on a more gentle ride through space.

rides.name: Remy's Ratatouille Adventure
rides.description: Feel like you’ve shrunk down to Chef Remy’s size for a 4D culinary adventure based on the Disney and Pixar film Ratatouille. When you’re small, life is a big adventure!

rides.name: Soarin' Around the World
rides.description: Take flight on a breezy, airborne adventure as you hang glide above the breathtaking wonders of the world.

rides.name: Spaceship Earth
rides.description: Travel through time and explore the remarkable history of human communication from the Stone Age to the computer age.

rides.name: Test Track
rides.description: Design a virtual concept car and put it to the test on this thrilling, high-octane attraction.

rides.name: The Seas With Nemo & Friends
rides.description: Go under the sea—without getting wet—on this gentle ride based on Disney and Pixar's Finding Nemo, which finds Nemo lost again.

parks.name: Disney's Hollywood Studios
parks.description: Disney's Hollywood Studios was initially developed as both a theme park inspired by show business and an operating production studio.

rides.name: Alien Swirling Saucers
rides.description: Power up the saucers for an interstellar romp through space, while futuristic tunes set the mood. Space cadets of all ages may enjoy this gentle whirl through the sky above Toy Story Land.

rides.name: Millennium Falcon: Smugglers Run
rides.description: Ride in the famous cockpit of the Millennium Falcon on a daring flight—and whether you’re a pilot, engineer or gunner, every role is crucial.

rides.name: Rock ‘n’ Roller Coaster Starring Aerosmith
rides.description: Race along the darkened freeways of Los Angeles in a super-stretch limo to the rockin' tunes of Aerosmith.

rides.name: Slinky Dog Dash
rides.description: Take off on a family-friendly coaster that twists and turns past giant toys and springs across Andy’s oversized backyard!

rides.name: Star Tours: The Adventures Continue
rides.description: Make the jump to hyperspace on a thrilling 3D space flight to legendary destinations from the Star Wars saga.

rides.name: Star Wars: Rise of the Resistance
rides.description: Join the Resistance in an unforgettable battle against the First Order on this exciting ride.

rides.name: The Twilight Zone Tower of Terror
rides.description: Hurtle up and down aboard a haunted elevator-style lift. You’re about to enter… The Twilight Zone!

rides.name: Toy Story Mania!
rides.description: Zip through an exhilarating 4D shootin’ game starring Toy Story characters—and blast away.

parks.name: Disney's Magic Kingdom
parks.description: The park is represented by Cinderella Castle, inspired by the fairy tale castle featured in the 1950 film

rides.name: Astro Orbiter
rides.description: Pilot a spaceship high in the sky amid a gleaming constellation of planets.

rides.name: Big Thunder Mountain
rides.description: Race through a haunted gold mine aboard a speeding train on this thrilling coaster-style ride.

rides.name: Buzz Lightyear’s Space Ranger Spin
rides.description: Fire your laser to earn points and defeat the Evil Emperor Zurg as you journey through a galactic space battle.

rides.name: Dumbo the Flying Elephant
rides.description: Soar high in the sky—and see an elephant fly—on a whimsical flight aboard Dumbo.

rides.name: Haunted Mansion
rides.description: Climb aboard a gloomy Doom Buggy for a grave journey through a labyrinth of haunted chambers.

rides.name: It’s a small world
rides.description: Embark on a whimsical boat ride past a jubilant chorus of children from around the globe.

rides.name: Jungle Cruise
rides.description: Chart a course for high adventure on a scenic and comedic boat tour of exotic rivers across Asia, Africa and South America.

rides.name: Liberty Square Riverboat
rides.description: Cruise the scenic Rivers of America aboard an authentic steam-powered paddle wheeler.

rides.name: Mad Tea Party
rides.description: Spin ‘round and ‘round in a giant teacup during a madcap music-filled whirlwind.

rides.name: Main Street Vehicles
rides.description: Travel back in time during a breezy drive down Main Street, U.S.A. in a charming turn-of-the-century vehicle.

rides.name: Peter Pan’s Flight
rides.description: Embark on a high-flying adventure over iconic scenes made famous in Disney’s animated film.

rides.name: Pirates of the Caribbean
rides.description: Set sail on a swashbuckling voyage to a long-forgotten time and place when pirates and privateers ruled the seas.

rides.name: Prince Charming Regal Carrousel
rides.description: Ride atop a regal steed and gallop through a whirling backdrop of wondrous color and whimsical music.

rides.name: Seven Dwarfs Mine Train
rides.description: Race through the diamond mine from Snow White and the Seven Dwarfs on a swaying family coaster ride.

rides.name: Space Mountain
rides.description: Blast off on a rip-roaring rocket into the furthest reaches of outer space on this roller-coaster ride in the dark.

rides.name: Splash Mountain
rides.description: Drop into a whimsical world filled with classic characters and songs on this thrilling log-flume adventure.

rides.name: The Magic Carpets of Aladdin
rides.description: Fly high over Adventureland on an enchanted carpet ride inspired by the Disney movie Aladdin.

rides.name: The Many Adventures of Winnie the Pooh
rides.description: Travel through Hundred-Acre Wood in an oversized Hunny Pot and get lost in the pages of A.A. Milne’s classic tales.

rides.name: Tomorrowland Transit Authority PeopleMover
rides.description: Embark on a 10-minute tour of Tomorrowland aboard this mass transit system of the future.

rides.name: Under the Sea – Journey of the Little Mermaid
rides.description: Board a clamshell and become part of Ariel’s world on a musical adventure awash with scenes from the animated classic.

rides.name: Walt Disney’s Carousel of Progress
rides.description: Travel through the 20th century and marvel at the evolution of technology during this classic Audio-Animatronics show.

parks.name: Legoland
parks.description: Designed for families with children ages 2 to 12, the park has more than fifty rides, shows, attractions, restaurants, and shops.

rides.name: Aquazone Wave Racers
rides.description: Family friendly hydro slider water carousel, which is operated in a water basin.

rides.name: Boating School
rides.description: Boating School is an attraction that enables guests to experience actual driving and steering of a boat through a course.

rides.name: Coastersaurus
rides.description: A classic wooden roller coaster designed to thrill riders with steep drops and fast turns.

rides.name: Flying School
rides.description: The train is designed to hang under the track (as opposed to a traditional roller coaster), giving guests who ride the feeling of flying.

rides.name: Ford Driving School
rides.description: An attraction that enables children to experience actual driving and steering of a car through a course

rides.name: Lego Ninjago Ride
rides.description: Blast animated fireballs, lightning and more at a sinister gallery of villains before teaming up to defeat a powerful foe.

rides.name: Lost Kingdom Adventure
rides.description: An interactive dark ride where guests compete for the highest score by shooting laser blasters

rides.name: Merlins Challenge
rides.description: A caterpillar ride that spins in a clockwise motion and progressively speeds up.

rides.name: Safari Trek
rides.description: A slow moving car ride where guests travel through a LEGO® jungle

rides.name: The Dragon
rides.description: The Dragon is an indoor/outdoor steel roller coaster

rides.name: The Great Lego Race
rides.description: The Great LEGO® Race is an exciting wild-mouse style rollercoaster that thrills riders with large drops, hair-pin turns, and thrill inducing fun!

parks.name: SeaWorld
parks.description: SeaWorld Orlando functions both as theme park and marine zoological park.

rides.name: Abby's Flower Tower
rides.description: Just a sprinkle of magic from Abby Cadabby’s wand will send you up, up, up in colorful flower pots aboard Abby’s Flower Tower.

rides.name: Big Bird's Twirl 'N' Whirl
rides.description: Ready… set … spin in a nest of your own when you enjoy Big Bird’s Twirl ‘N’ Whirl.

rides.name: Cookie Drop
rides.description: Get carried away in a cloud of cookie crumbs as you bounce up and down on Cookie Monster’s Cookie Drop!

rides.name: Elmo's Choo Choo Train
rides.description: It’s all aboard for everyone on Elmo’s Choo Choo Train, an interactive bell-ringing, horn-honking train ride you won’t want to miss!

rides.name: Flamingo Paddle Boats
rides.description: Climb aboard one of our paddle boats for a leisurely tour of SeaWorld Orlando's large central lake.

rides.name: Ice Breaker
rides.description: Our brand new roller coaster features four airtime filled launches, both backwards and forwards, culminating in a reverse launch into the steepest beyond vertical drop in Florida.

rides.name: Infinity Falls
rides.description: Experience world-class rapids and the tallest drop in Florida as you embark on this rafting adventure.

rides.name: Journey to Atlantis
rides.description: Water ride enthusiasts are in for a thrill as this mythical paradise reveals its darker side.

rides.name: Kraken
rides.description: Born from tales that struck terror in sailors for centuries, SeaWorld Orlando's mighty Kraken® is a monster coaster like no other.

rides.name: Mako
rides.description: Ride Mako®, a hyper coaster known for high speeds, deep dives, and thrills around every turn.

rides.name: Manta
rides.description: Find out what it’s like to spin, glide, skim and fly like a giant ray when you experience the only flying roller coaster of its kind in Florida.

rides.name: Sky Tower
rides.description: Our 400-foot Sky Tower has stood as an icon for our park since it opened in summer 1974. Today the Sky Tower adds a dose of retro-cool to the day’s adventures.

rides.name: Slimey's Sliders
rides.description: Climb into Slimey’s Slider for an exhilarating swoop and swivel ride through Oscar the Grouch’s treasured compost collection!

rides.name: Sunny Day Carousel
rides.description: The Sunny Day Carousel is a cute, colorful, classic ride that’s perfect for everyone who likes a good go-round.

rides.name: Super Grover's Box Car Derby
rides.description: Sesame Street's own furry superhero wants you behind the wheel for a racing good time at Super Grover's Box Car Derby.

parks.name: Universal's Islands of Adventure
parks.description: Islands of Adventure is modeled after a journey of exploration, where guests embark on an adventure to visit a variety of themed islands.

rides.name: Caro-Seuss-El
rides.description: This carousel has an array of fun and unusual creatures from the imagination of Dr. Seuss.

rides.name: Doom’s Fearfall
rides.description: This ride is a high-speed, free-fall experience that includes sudden and intense acceleration, climbing and dropping

rides.name: Dudley Do-Right Ripsaw Falls
rides.description: This ride is a water journey in a floating log. The log will suddenly accelerate, turn, and drop.

rides.name: Flight of the Hippogriff
rides.description: This high-speed roller coaster ride includes sudden and dramatic accelerations, climbing, tilting and dropping.

rides.name: Hagrid’s Magical Creatures Motorbike Adventure
rides.description: This is a high speed roller coaster that includes sudden dramatic acceleration, climbing, tilting, dropping, and backwards motion.

rides.name: Harry Potter and the Forbidden Journey
rides.description: This ride simulates dramatic aerobatics. The ride vehicle will suddenly accelerate, stop, turn, tilt, climb, and drop.

rides.name: Hogwarts Express: Hogsmeade Station
rides.description: This is a passenger train that involves traveling in an enclosed cabin and includes loud noises and low-lighting conditions.

rides.name: Jurassic Park River Adventure Ride
rides.description: This ride is a water journey on a touring raft. The raft will suddenly and dramatically accelerate, turn, and drop. Riders will get wet, possibly soaked.

rides.name: Jurassic World VelociCoaster
rides.description: This is a high-speed roller coaster that includes sudden and dramatic acceleration, climbing, tilting, inversions, and dropping.

rides.name: One fish, Two fish, Red fish, Blue Fish
rides.description: This is a circular motion gondola ride. Up and down movement is controlled by the rider. Riders will get wet.

rides.name: Popeye and Bluto’s Bilge-rat Barges
rides.description: This ride is a water journey in a circular barge. The barge will suddenly accelerate, turn and drop.

rides.name: Pteranodon Flyers
rides.description: This glider style roller coaster includes climbing, side-to-side swinging and sudden acceleration.

rides.name: Skull Island: Reign of Kong
rides.description: This 3-D ride is an expedition through the rough terrain of King Kong’s natural habitat.

rides.name: Storm Force Accelatron
rides.description: This attraction seats riders in round pods and subjects you to sudden acceleration, turning, and spinning.

rides.name: The Amazing Adventures of Spider-Man
rides.description: This 3-D ride takes a journey through the world of Spider-Man™ in a prototype news vehicle.

rides.name: The Cat in the Hat Ride
rides.description: This ride takes a journey through the world of The Cat in the Hat™.

rides.name: The High in the Sky Seuss Trolley Train
rides.description: This ride is a trolley train through Seuss Landing™ on an elevated track.

rides.name: The Incredible Hulk Coaster
rides.description: This is a high-speed roller coaster ride that includes sudden and dramatic acceleration, climbing, tilting, and dropping.

parks.name: Universal Studios
parks.description: Universal Studios Florida was originally designed to function as both a theme park and working production studio.

rides.name: Despicable Me Minion Mayhem
rides.description: Simulates the action of a high-speed aerial chase, with sudden turns and strong lighting effects.

rides.name: E.T. Adventure
rides.description: Forest chase on a flying bicycle, with sudden acceleration and turns.

rides.name: Fast And Furious - Supercharged
rides.description: High-octane journey into the underground racing world with sudden acceleration and turns.

rides.name: Harry Potter and the Escape from Gringotts
rides.description: A high-speed roller coaster with 3-D visuals and sudden movements.

rides.name: Hogwarts™ Express
rides.description: A passenger train with an enclosed cabin, loud noises, and low-lighting conditions.

rides.name: Hollywood Rip Ride Rockit™
rides.description: High-speed roller coaster that includes sudden and dramatic accelerations, climbs, tilts, and drops

rides.name: Kang & Kodos' Twirl 'n' Hurl
rides.description: Circular motion gondola ride with a lot of spinning!

rides.name: MEN IN BLACK™ Alien Attack
rides.description: Men In Black recruits on the city streets for an intense training exercise, sudden movements and spins.

rides.name: Race Through New York Starring Jimmy Fallon
rides.description: Simulates a high speed, turbulent thrill ride with dramatic aerobatics, rapid acceleration and movements.

rides.name: Revenge of the Mummy
rides.description: A Mummy themes coaster with sudden movements and drops.

rides.name: The Simpsons Ride
rides.description: Motion simulator with many sudden movements.

rides.name: TRANSFORMERS: The Ride-3D
rides.description: This Ride takes place on a high-speed vehicle that will suddenly and dramatically accelerate and make movements.

rides.name: Woody Woodpecker's Nuthouse Coaster
rides.description: High-speed roller coaster that includes sudden and dramatic accelerations, climbs, tilts, and drops
